  • Uses of MaterialUv in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return MaterialUv 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.flipX()
    Flips the material horizontally.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.flipY()
    Flips the material vertically.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.moveBy​(Vec2 dir)
    Moves this material by a vector.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.moveTo​(Vec2 locNew)
    Moves this material to a location.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.moveTo​(Vec2 locNew, float step)
    Moves this material to a location over a step in time.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.rotateTo​(float rotNew)
    Rotates this material to an angle.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.rotateTo​(float rotNew, float step)
    Rotates this material to an angle over a step in time.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this material by an angle around the z axis.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.scaleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the material by a scalar.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.scaleBy​(Vec2 scalar)
    Scales the material by a non-uniform scalar.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.scaleTo​(float scalar)
    Scales the material to a uniform size.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.scaleTo​(Vec2 scalar)
    Scales the material to a non-uniform size.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.scaleTo​(Vec2 scalar, float step)
    Eases the material to a scale by a step over time.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.setTint​(float r, float g, float b)
    Sets the material's tint color.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.setTint​(float r, float g, float b, float a)
    Sets the material's tint color.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.setTint​(int tint)
    Sets the material's tint color from a hexadecimal value.
    MaterialUv MaterialUv.setTint​(Color tint)
    Sets the material's tint color.
